channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Jack (Blue Dragon) - Converts to Mimic (Unseen)
channel.description:
**Jack** (Name is based on "Jack of All Trades", mixed with the playing card suit.)
Passive: **All Trades** - You spawn with one random BD day ability and two random BD night abilities.
Comments: In other words, your passive means you can spawn with randomized abilities from other Blue Dragon classes. For example: Psychic Shout, Debauch, and Wolf. Of course, certain abilities like those of the Prince and King would NOT be available to the Jack.
**Converts to...**
**Mimic** - (A lot of people have suggested "Mimic" classes, and I think this one REALLY fits!)
Passive: **Amorphous** - You spawn with one random Unseen day ability and two random Unseen night abilities.
Comments: Same thing, but for the Unseen. Again, certain actions would NOT be available to the Mimic, like Mastermind's conversion.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Jack (Blue Dragon) - Converts to Mimic (Unseen)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
Was thinking you’d get the normal # of uses that the “real” class gets.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Jack (Blue Dragon) - Converts to Mimic (Unseen)
item.dc:creator: DeathReaperRH
item.description:
I love this idea.Also why not give jack 2 day abilities and 1 passive?One question if you get like hunter’s bear from your passive do you get 3 uses or just 1?
(This goes for everything with a limited use ability)(Reanimate,wolf,bear,window peak,wisp,party,ice ward,smite,psychic shout,etc)

Read full topic

item.description:

I like ti but it needs a bit more control
